text: Pentti Kalevi Siimes (10 September 1929 – 27 October 2016) was a Finnish actor. He appeared in 86 movies and television shows between 1946 and 2008. He was born in Helsinki, Finland. Siimes starred in the movie Miriam, which was entered into the 8th Berlin International Film Festival. He was known for his role as PFC. Määttä in the 1955 movie The Unknown Soldier. Siimes died on 27 October 2016 in Helsinki, Finland at the age of 87.STT: Pentti Siimes on kuollut == References == == Other websites == * Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Finnish movie actors Category:Actors from Helsinki
title: Pentti Siimes
